properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: I belong to Jesus; He is Lord and King, Reigning in my inmost heart Over everything.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I belong to Jesus; What can hurt or harm, When He folds around my soul His almighty Arm?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I belong to Jesus; Blessed, blessed thought! With His own most precious blood Has my soul been bought.

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: I belong to Jesus; He will keep my soul, If the deathly waters dark Round about me roll.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: I belong to Jesus; And ere long Iâ€™ll be With my precious Savior there In His royalty.
